attributes.action: Legalise swegway/hoverboards in the uk. Allow people to ride them on pavements!
attributes.background: Hoverboards should be legal in the uk and people should be allowed to ride them on the pavement. It is legal to ride scooters, electric scooters, and even electric wheel chairs on the pavement but not swegways. I can understand not being able to ride them on the road but pavements should be allowed.
